ModMetaData.name: RimMercenaries - Hire Professional Warriors
ModMetaData.author: NaftSan
ModMetaData.description: Adds a mercenary network to the Comms Console, allowing you to hire skilled fighters for silver. Features: • Hire mercenaries through your colony's Comms Console • Three tiers of mercenaries with different skill levels and costs: - Raiders: Basic fighters with minimal training (450-750 silver) - Fighters: Well-rounded mercenaries with improved combat skills (950-1300 silver) - Veterans: Elite warriors with high combat skills and medical knowledge (1850-2500 silver) • Mercenaries arrive via drop pod shortly after hiring • Periodically refreshed mercenary roster (every 15 days) • Each refresh gives access to 10 Raiders, 5 Fighters, and 2 Veterans Biotech Support: • Filter available mercenaries by xenotype • Pre-generated batches for common xenotypes to reduce loading time How to Use: 1. Build a powered Comms Console 2. Assign a colonist with Social skill as negotiator 3. Contact the "Mercenary Network" 4. Browse available mercenaries and hire those that fit your needs Compatible with existing saves. Can be safely added to or removed from ongoing games. Note: Requires a skilled negotiator (a colonist capable of social interaction) to contact the mercenary network.
